page.title: 04GIRL GUIDE BIRTHDAY EVENTS
page.content: The 5th. Blyth Guides held a reunion night of songs and readings at the United Reformed Church for all past and present guides. Uniforms worn over the last 75 years were displayed. A special cake was cut by a past guide and another guide dressed in the uniform of 1910. On{29th.June 1985}the Nortumberland County Guides, Brownies, Rangers, Young Leaders and Guiders attended a { {Rally}at Croft Park, Blyth to celebrate{75 YEARS}of Guiding. Approximately{3000}people attended, participating in activities such as craft, cookery, dancing and face painting. A Thanksgiving Service was held, all sections of the Movement taking an active part. The{Fun Day}ended with the lighting of{75}torches and a firework display.
